channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier, TX1, TX2, and Nano L4T
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier, TX1, TX2, and Nano L4T

item.title: CVE-2020-5974|2024-08-04T08:47:40.886Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%2C%20tx1%2C%20tx2%2C%20and%20nano%20l4t
item.description: NVIDIA JetPack SDK, version 4.2 and 4.3, contains a vulnerability in its installation scripts in which permissions are incorrectly set on certain directories, which can lead to escalation of privileges.
